channel.title: Parker Posey on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Parker Posey on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mike White Envisioned the Ratliffs as “the Brunette Version” of the Family From ‘White Lotus’ Season 1
item.description: The creator joined season three stars Parker Posey, Jason Isaacs, Natasha Rothwell, Sam Rockwell and Carrie Coon for a conversation at HBO Max’s Nominee Celebration.
